name: Pixel Bloons
description:
Try to kill as many balloons as you can in this heavily inspired Bloons TD game! Normal monkeys do not immediately give money to the player on a hit; they must be sold so the player can receive. Bandana monkeys can shot fast, and are cheaper, but they have a limited ammount of ammunition and they generate less money than a normal monkey.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Click and hold LMB on a tower in the top-right corner to place it;

RMB on a placed tower to sell it;

Towers show the ammount of money received on sell, and bandana monkeys also show the ammount of ammunition left to shot.
